Text: Skyline Drive:  The drive's northern terminus is at an intersection with U.S. Route 340 (US 340) near Front Royal, and the southern terminus is at an interchange with US 250 near Interstate 64 (I-64) in Rockfish Gap, where the road continues south as the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Text: Skyline Drive:  The road has intermediate interchanges with US 211 in Thornton Gap and US 33 in Swift Run Gap.
